name: Manifest 99
description: MANIFEST 99 is an ominous and eerie VR story set on a train rumbling through the afterlife. Accompanied by a murder of crows and four mysterious travel companions, you must uncover the reason why they – and you – are on this train traveling into the great beyond.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8 Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 or greater Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 / AMD 290 equivalent or greater DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space Additional Notes: HDMI 1.4 / DisplayPort 1.2
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 or greater Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 / AMD RX 480 DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 3 GB available space Additional Notes: HDMI 1.4 / DisplayPort 1.2
